headline: Dividend Growth and Earnings Outlook Might Change the Case for Investing in Coterra Energy (CTRA)
summary: Earlier this week, Coterra Energy was highlighted for its strong dividend profile, with a current yield well above industry averages, five dividend increases in five years, and forecasts of a nearly 53% year-over-year earnings rise for fiscal 2025. This dividend growth, coupled with a sustainable payout ratio and consistently rising earnings, points to Coterra’s ability to deliver both reliable income and long-term growth potential for shareholders. We'll examine how Coterra's record of...
